content: Set storage quota to define the maximum disk space for this {{productName}}.

comment.text: "Defines the maximum disk space allowed for {{productName}}. This quota will be displayed as a storage limit option in the [Change Storage Quota Dialog] when setting or editing storage limits."

usage.context:
<Text noSelect>
 {isDisableQuota
 ? t("Common:TurnOffDiskSpaceLimit", {
 productName: t("Common:ProductName"),
 })
 : t("Common:SetDiskSpaceQuota", {
 productName: t("Common:ProductName"),
 })}
 </Text>
 {!isDisableQuota ? (
 <QuotaForm

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'yaddaş' (memory) doesn't accurately convey 'storage'. It should be 'saxlama' or 'saxtalama'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu {{productName}} üçün maksimum disk yerini müəyyən etmək üçün saxtalama/saxlama kvotasını təyin edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'pro tento prostor {{productName}}' is awkward and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'for this {{productName}}'. It implies a 'space' or location, not the product itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavte kvótu úložiště a určete maximální prostor na disku pro tento {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'prostor' (space) in the suggested correction still doesn't sound completely natural in this context. It's technically correct, but a more fluid option might improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavte kvótu úložiště a určete maximální prostor na disku pro {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Ορίστε ποσόστωση αποθ. χώρου" is a bit literal and less natural than it could be. A more natural phrasing would be "Καθορίστε ποσόστωση αποθηκευτικού χώρου" or "Ορίστε όριο αποθηκευτικού χώρου".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Καθορίστε ποσόστωση αποθηκευτικού χώρου

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'αποθ. χώρου' is an abbreviation that may not be immediately clear to all users. While technically correct, using the full term 'αποθηκευτικού χώρου' would enhance clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: αποθηκευτικού χώρου

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Aseta muistikiintiö' is a literal translation of 'Set storage quota' but might not be the most natural phrasing in Finnish.  'Aseta' is correct but 'muistikiintiö' (memory quota) isn't as common as alternatives like 'levytilan rajoitus' or 'tallennustilan rajoitus' for 'storage quota'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Aseta tallennustilan rajoitus' or 'Aseta levytilan rajoitus'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, 'maksimilevytilan' is a somewhat clunky phrasing.  A more common and natural way to express 'maximum disk space' would be 'suurimman levytilan'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'maksimilevytilan' with 'suurimman levytilan'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "définir l'espace de stockage maximum" is redundant. "Définir le quota de stockage" implies setting the maximum storage space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Définissez le quota de stockage pour ce {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation is overly literal and slightly awkward. The phrase "սկավառակի առավելագույն տարածությունը սահմանելու համար" (to define the maximum disk space) is redundant since 'set' already implies defining a limit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Սահմանեք պահեստի չափը՝ այս {{productName}}-ի առավելագույն սկավառակային տարածությունը:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation includes a colon (:) at the end of the sentence which is less common in Armenian user interface text. It makes the sentence feel more formal and less conversational.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon at the end of the sentence.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ストレージ容量制限を設定してください" (set storage capacity limit) is a bit too direct and formal for a user-facing message. It's better to convey the meaning of setting a quota more naturally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: この{{productName}}のディスク使用量の上限を設定してください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the Japanese translation uses a full stop (。) at the end. While not strictly wrong, the tone is slightly more formal than typical user interface text. Omitting it would create a more conversational and friendly tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: この{{productName}}のディスク使用量の上限を設定してください

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '스토리지 할당량을 설정하세요' (Set storage quota) is a bit too imperative. A more natural Korean phrasing would be more informative.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 이 {{productName}}에 대한 최대 디스크 공간을 정의하려면, 스토리지 할당량을 설정하여 제한할 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'ກຸ້ມຂັ້ນເງິນ' (gum khan ngoen) doesn't directly translate to 'quota'. It refers more to a fixed amount of money. A more accurate translation would be something like 'ຈຳນວນທີ່ກຳນົດ' (jamnuan thi kamnod) or 'ມິເຕີໂຕີ' (meter tor).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ກຳນົດຈຳນວນທີ່ກຳນົດສຳລັບການເກັບຮັກສາເພື່ອຕັ້ງຄ່າຂະໜາດສູງສຸດຂອງເນື້ອທີ່ໃນໂຕ້ຖາດສຳລັບ {{productName}} ນີ້.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'ໂຕ້ຖາດສຳລັບ' can be improved. While understandable, it's a bit clunky. A more natural wording would improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ກຳນົດຈຳນວນທີ່ກຳນົດສຳລັບການເກັບຮັກສາເພື່ອຕັ້ງຄ່າຂະໜາດສູງສຸດຂອງເນື້ອທີ່ໃນ {{productName}} ນີ້.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Iestatiet krātuves kvotu, lai definētu maksimālo vietu šajā {{productName}} diskā" is not the most natural or accurate translation. "Vietu diskā" is a bit awkward. A more accurate phrasing would convey the quota applies to the product's storage, not the physical disk.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Iestatiet krātuves kvotu, lai definētu maksimālo šī {{productName}} uzglabāšanas vietu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "storage quota" is best translated as "limit przestrzeni dyskowej" or "przydział dyskowy" in Polish, not just "limit pamięci". While 'limit pamięci' isn't inherently wrong, it's not the most accurate or idiomatic translation for 'storage quota'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ustaw limit przestrzeni dyskowej, aby zdefiniować maksymalną przestrzeń dyskową dla tego {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'spațiu {{productName}}' doesn't accurately convey 'this {{productName}}'. It implies a space for the product rather than referring to the product itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Setați cota de stocare pentru a defini spațiul maxim de stocare pentru acest {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the sentence structure 'Setați cota de stocare pentru a defini spațiul maxim de stocare' is a bit redundant. 'Spațiul de stocare' is implied by 'cota de stocare'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Setați cota de stocare pentru a defini spațiul maxim pentru acest {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation 'ආචයන සලාකය' (aachayana salaakaya) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'storage quota'. It appears to be a mistranslation or a term not commonly used in this context.  'ආචයන' (aachayana) generally relates to religious rituals or ceremonies. The meaning is completely off.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'ගබඩාවේ ඉඩ ප්‍රමාණය' (gabadavé ida pramaṇaya) - 'storage space amount', or 'භාරකිරීමේ සීමාව' (bhaarakarimē sīmavā) - 'limit of loading/storage'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is awkward.  'මෙම {{productName}} සඳහා තැටියේ උපරිම ඉඩ පෙන්වීමට' is grammatically acceptable but not the most natural phrasing in Sinhala.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing the entire sentence for better flow and clarity, perhaps starting with '{{productName}} සඳහා උපරිම ඉඩ ප්‍රමාණය සකසන්න' ({{productName}} saḍa uparima ida pramaṇaya sakasanna) - 'Set the maximum space for {{productName}}'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation 'priestor' is used instead of a more appropriate term for 'product'.  'produkt' would be a closer translation of 'product'. Using 'priestor' implies space, which doesn't quite fit the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavte kvótu úložiska, aby ste vymedzili maximálny priestor na disku pre tento produkt {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'складишну' (skladishnu) is not the most natural translation of 'storage' in this context. It literally means 'warehouse-related'. A more appropriate translation would be 'простор за чување' (prostor za cuvanje) or 'капацитет за чување' (kapacitet za cuvanje).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Поставите простор за чување квоту да бисте дефинисали максимални простор на диску за овај {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'this' is unnecessary and slightly awkward in the Vietnamese translation. It's redundant given the context of referring to the product.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Đặt hạn mức lưu trữ để xác định dung lượng ổ đĩa tối đa cho {{productName}}.
